Army Photographers is from the collection of Robert Pope of Lavergne, Tennessee .Mr . Pope also furnished the photograph of B.L. Ridley on the cover of Publication Number 25. Judy Lee Green Mrs. Mabel Pittard Publication No. 26 (Limited Edition—650 copies) is distributed to members of the Society. The annual member-ship is $10 (family--$ 1 1 ) , which includes the regular pub-lication and the monthly NEWSLETTER to all members. Additional copies of Publication No. 26 may be obtained at $5 per copy. All correspondence concerning additional copies, contributions to future issues, and membership should be addressed to: Rutherford County Historical Society P. O. This volume contains several articles, each of which is treated separately in this collection and can be searched individually
